Canvassing 

     The Lord calls upon our youth to labor as canvassers and evangelists, to do house-to-house work in places that have not yet heard the truth. He speaks to our young men, saying, "Ye are not your own; for ye are bought with a price; therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's." Those who will go forth to the work 
                                                                           221
under God's direction will be wonderfully blessed. --"Testimonies for the Church," Vol. 8, p. 229.
